DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study identify safe tolerable dose drug KU-0059436 give combination topotecan chemotherapy patient advance solid tumour
DOC.brief_title: Study Assess Safety Tolerability PARP Inhibitor Combination With Topotecan
DOC.criteria: Histological cytological diagnosis advance solid tumour suitable effective therapy exist ; Evaluable disease Adequate bone marrow , hepatic renal function Any chemotherapy , radiotherapy ( except palliative ) , endocrine immunotherapy within 4 week prior entry ; major surgery 4 week enter study Heavily pre treat patient > 2 previous chemotherapy regimens metastatic disease Coexisting active infection
